name: Imagine: Salon Stylist
description:
'Imagine: Salon Stylist' is a hairdresser simulator for the Nintendo DS. It was released on September 19th, 2009, and was published by Ubisoft as part of the 'Imagine' franchise.

Hairstyling, hair color and accessories, and makeup application. Create customer files for each customer and learn their beauty preferences. Satisfy them at every visit and they will return to your salon! Design your salon and customize it so that it matches your style.
